Package GUI.Game.Controllers

Class ForestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Game.Controllers.GameController
      • GUI.Game.Controllers.ForestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ForestController
extends GameController
    This controller controls forest GUI elements and is an extension of GameController class. It can switch between forest buttons and combat buttons. Combat is initiated from here and player input during combat is taken from this controller.

      ForestController()

    • Method Detail

      • combat_pressAttackBtn

        public void combat_pressAttackBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing attack button.

      • combat_pressFireballBtn

        public void combat_pressFireballBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing fireball button.

      • combat_pressHpPotionBtn

        public void combat_pressHpPotionBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing hp potion button.

      • combat_pressMpPotionBtn

        public void combat_pressMpPotionBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing mp potion button.

      • combat_pressFlamestrikeBtn

        public void combat_pressFlamestrikeBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing flamestrike button.

      • combat_pressHealBtn

        public void combat_pressHealBtn()
        This method handles event of pressing heal button.

      • pressHunt

        public void pressHunt()
        This method handles event of pressing hunt button. It creates new instance of combat and displays monsters in GUI. It also sends message to combat log signaling the start of first turn.

      • updateForest_monsterHBox

        public void updateForest_monsterHBox()
        This method is used for updating displayed monsters in GUI. It is capable of adding any amount of monsters to GUI.

      • clearMonsters

        public void clearMonsters()
        Removes all monsters from GUI

      • pressReturn

        public void pressReturn()
        This method handles event of pressing return/flee button. When returning it simply sends you to village. When fleeing it runs the flee method from combat.

      • returnToVillage

        public void returnToVillage()
        This will send the player to village. Creates a new controller and passes all the required data there. Changes the root of current scene to the root of village.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        This allows the controller to send messages to combat log.
        Parameters:
        message - String that will be printed in combat log.

      • setForestButtons

        public void setForestButtons()
        Sets buttons to forest buttons. In this state player can interact with player pane's buttons. In the forest pane player is allowed to interact with forest buttons, for example they can hunt to initiate combat. Return button is set to "return" state.

      • setCombatButtons

        public void setCombatButtons()
        Sets buttons to combat buttons. In this state player cannot interact with player pane's buttons. In the forest pane player is allowed to interact with combat buttons, for example they can attack opponents, use skills, etc... Return buttons is set to "flee" state.

      • disableCombatButtons

        public void disableCombatButtons()
        This method is called to prevent the player from acting during opponent's turn.

      • enableCombatButtons

        public void enableCombatButtons()
        This method is called at the start of player turn to allow him to act.

      • updateForest_all

        public void updateForest_all()
        Updates all forest GUI elements.

      • updateForest_fireball

        public void updateForest_fireball()
        Updates fireball button in forest GUI. It will be disabled when the player has yet to learn this skill or they don't have enough mana to cast it.

      • updateForest_flamestrike

        public void updateForest_flamestrike()
        Updates flamestrike button in forest GUI. It will be disabled when the player has yet to learn this skill or they don't have enough mana to cast it.

      • updateForest_heal

        public void updateForest_heal()
        Updates heal button in forest GUI. It will be disabled when the player has yet to learn this skill or they don't have enough mana to cast it.

      • updateForest_hpPotion

        public void updateForest_hpPotion()
        Updates hp potions button in forest GUI. It will be disabled when the player is at full health or doesn't have any hp potions.

      • updateForest_mpPotion

        public void updateForest_mpPotion()
        Updates mp potions button in forest GUI. It will be disabled when the player is at full mana or doesn't have any mp potions.
